description: Primes p such that x^21 = 2 has no solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A049553 relative to A000040.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_] := Reduce[Mod[x^21 - 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] == False; Select[Prime[Range[150]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 20 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(710) | not exists{x: x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^21 eq 2}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 20 2012
author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 25 2001
